Calculate p-values using Wilcoxon rank sum test.

Source: R/difference_functions.R
wilcoxon.Rd

Calculate p-values using Wilcoxon rank sum test.

Usage

wilcoxon(x, samples, pcorr = "BH", paired = FALSE, exact = FALSE)

Arguments

x

A matrix with the splicing diversity values.

samples

Character vector with an equal length to the number of columns in the input dataset, specifying the category of each sample.

pcorr

P-value correction method applied to the results, as defined in the p.adjust function.

paired

If TRUE, the Wilcox-test will be paired, and therefore it will be a signed rank test instead of the rank sum test.

exact

If TRUE, an exact p-value will be computed.

Value

Raw and corrected p-values in a matrix.

On this page
